ArmUsInfo Class Referenceabstract

Class that controls the arm. Contains a virtual void function, cannot be instantiated. Instead, instantiate either Arm Us Info Real or Arm Us Info Simul depending on the control mode. The two derived classes exist because the implementation of the controls are different in each one. More...

Detailed Description

Class that controls the arm. Contains a virtual void function, cannot be instantiated. Instead, instantiate either Arm Us Info Real or Arm Us Info Simul depending on the control mode. The two derived classes exist because the implementation of the controls are different in each one.

Member Function Documentation

◆ calculate_motor_velocities()

virtual void ArmUsInfo::calculate_motor_velocities ( )
pure virtual

Virtual void function that calculates the motor commands that are sent to the motor translator The implementation is different in each derived class, depending on the control mode chosen when launching the node.

Implemented in ArmUsInfoReal, and ArmUsInfoSimul.
